channel.title: Pi shop help
channel.description: every time i try and sell an item to a shop it says "connection lost please wait" then when it comes back it has 1 item sold... any ideas on how i can fix it from "losing connection" when i try to sell something?

can you post up your sellItem method from your shopAssistant class?
